檴檴檴

Related Character(s): 樗
Связанный символ (и): 樗

檴字的基本解释

檴
huò
古书上说的一种树，叶像榆叶，树皮坚韧，可当绳索用，木材可做杯器。

檴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huò］
［《廣韻》胡郭切，入鐸，匣。］
木名。即椰榆。
[②]［huà］
［《廣韻》胡化切，去禡，匣。］
同“樺1”。
桦木。

檴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檴； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页558第37
【唐韻】同樺。　又【唐韻】胡郭切，音鑊。【爾雅·釋木】檴落。【註】可爲杯器素。【郉疏】檴，一名落素，謂樸也。【詩·小雅】無浸檴薪。【陸璣疏】檴㭨，楡也。其葉如楡，其皮堅韌，剝之長數尺，可爲絚索，其材可爲杯器。【說文】以檴爲樗重文，今从《正字通》改正。

檴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檴字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，叶像榆叶，树皮坚韧。

red elm
Basic explanation of words
red elm
huò
A tree mentioned in ancient books, the leaves are like elm leaves, the bark is tough, can be used as a rope, and the wood can be used as a cup.
red elm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huò]
["Guangyun" Hu Guoqie, enter the duo, box. ]
Wooden name. Namely coconut elm.
[②]［huà］
["Guangyun" Hu Huaqie, go to 禡, box. ]
Same as "Hua 1".
birch.
red elm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檴; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 558 Page 37
【Tang Yun】Same as Hua.　[Tang Yun] Hu Guoqie, sound wok. 【Erya Shimu】has fallen off. [Note] It can be a cup element. [Xing Shu] Wei, the one who has fallen in style, is called Pu Ye. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】No immersion salary. [Lu Ji Shu] 檴㭨, 楡也. Its leaves are like jelly, its skin is tough, and its peeling length is several feet, it can be a dredging rope, and its material can be a cup. 【Said the text】The text is emphasized on the basis of 檴, now corrected from "Zhengzitong".
